title: Lesson 81
paragraph: This lesson focuses on progress and innovation, highlighting forward-thinking, inventive, and visionary qualities.

words.meaning: planning or thinking about the future with imagination or wisdom
words.japaneseMeaning: 先見の明のある、未来志向の
words.example: The company is forward-thinking in its approach to sustainability.
Her trailblazing research changed the field of medicine.

words.meaning: having the ability to create or design new things
words.japaneseMeaning: 創意に富んだ、発明的な
words.example: He is very inventive in solving problems.
They conducted pioneering research in renewable energy.
The discovery was groundbreaking for science.

words.meaning: thinking about or planning the future with imagination
words.japaneseMeaning: 先見の明のある、理想主義的な
words.example: He is a visionary leader with bold ideas.

words.meaning: relating to modern ideas or techniques
words.japaneseMeaning: モダニストの、現代主義の

words.meaning: intended to bring about improvement or reform
words.japaneseMeaning: 改革的な、改善のための
words.example: The reformative policies improved the education system.

words.meaning: far on or ahead in development or progress
words.example: They use advanced technology in their factories.

words.meaning: favoring or implementing social reform or new ideas
